document_data.name: ''Wand of Grease''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of grease''''' were magic [[wand]]s that stored and unleashed the ''[[grease]]'' [[spell]] on command.
document_data.Description: ''Wands of grease'' were utterly mundane in appearance because of the material used in their creation. Each wand resembled a knotted piece of driftwood.
document_data.Powers: Upon an utterance of its [[command word]], a ''wand of grease'' unleashed a single spell stored within. Each wand held a number of charges and disintegrated upon the use of its last spell.
document_data.History: One notable creator of ''wands of grease'' was the [[enchantress]] [[Elytharra Dinnesmore]] of [[Neverwinter]] who took residence in the town of [[Targos]] sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1312}}. She started [[enchanted|enchanting]] ''wands of grease'' to slow and frustrate any creatures and savage species of the [[North]] that occasionally attacked the [[Ten Towns]].
